cards.name: Sweeping Meadow Gate
cards.ability: When summoning a Human Minion or Hero to this Gate, give them +2 Health Point.

cards.name: Windswept Field Gate
cards.ability: At the beginning or your turn you may give up to two Minions or Heroes that occupy a Grassland Ruin +1 Movement until end of turn.

cards.name: Gentralia Frontier Gate
cards.ability: Once during your Summoning Phase you may Discard a Minion from your Staging Area that shares your Heroâ€™s Race to fully Heal your Hero.

cards.name: Whistling Woods Gate
cards.ability: Once per turn you may pay 1 Echo to give one Wood Elf you control with Range 1 gains Range 2.

cards.name: Warped Oak Gate
cards.ability: At the beginning of your turn you may give up to two Minions or Heroes that occupy a Forest Ruin +1 Defense until end of turn.

cards.name: Elvish Nation Treetops Gate
cards.ability: While you control an active Hero you gain +2 Echoes per Turn.

cards.name: Freshwater Loch Gate
cards.ability: When summoning a Merfolk to this Gate you may give a Relic in your Relic Hold a Charge.

cards.name: Tranquil Lake Gate
cards.ability: When a Minion or Hero you control enters a Lake Ruin from a non-Lake Ruin Heal it 1.

cards.name: Glizakill Metropolis Gate
cards.ability: Once per turn you may use up to 2 Charge from one Relic and Charge another Relic by that much.

cards.name: Cranberry Growths Gate
cards.ability: Boglings summoned to this Gate gain +1 Movement and Bloodlust until end of turn

cards.name: Infested Swamps Gate
cards.ability: When this Gate is Attacked it deals 2 Damage directly to the Attacker

cards.name: Creaking Swamp-Float Gate
cards.ability: When a Minion or Hero you control occupies a Wetlands Ruin it gains one: +1 Attack or +1 Defense

cards.name: Blackstone Crags Gate
cards.ability: Dwarves you control may Equip gear weight up to twice their Attack.

cards.name: Alpine Peaks Gate
cards.ability: Minions and Heroes you control that move from Mountain Ruins into non-Mountain Ruins gain +1 Movement until end of turn.

cards.name: Silvervein Gate
cards.ability: Gear you control does not count toward your Relic Hold and when a Minion or Hero you control dies you may move any equipped Gear to your Relic Hold instead of discarding them.

cards.name: Uncultivated Tunnels Gate
cards.ability: During your first Movement Step Dark Elves you control may Move between Depths Ruins without using any of its Movement.

cards.name: Dripping Cavern Gate
cards.ability: When you Summon a Minion or Hero to this Gate you may immediately Move it to a Depth Ruin that is within two Legal Connections from this Gate.

cards.name: East Fentia Gate
cards.ability: When a Minion or Hero you control is discarded from your Staging Area but still has Health remaining, gain Echoes equal to its remaining Health.
